interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces))
Review Date: 2021/03/23
Store: Eye Love
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'}
Review Text: This looks like organic soap that I buy at farmer's market's and smells really fun! It has a hint of a lemon/lime smell to it. Just touching the bar of soap right out of the box, I knew it was a quality product. It is just a bit soft and silky-feeling, just like artisans soaps. It lathers up well and I love all of its ingredients. Highly recommend!!
Review Title: Quality charcoal soap!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
I like the smell of this and how light it is. It does kinda feel like jelly and doesn’t lather up super great for me, but it gets the job done and makes my face feel good. Haven’t broken out or had irritated skin from it. The smell is light and reminds me of something I can’t put my finger on...maybe light citrus candy or something? It smells pretty good to me and I enjoy washing with this in the shower. Good size too!
A pleasant, non-irritating face wash
Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381035006'}
I love a good face mask - this hits all the marks for me. It is thick and basically feels like wet pottery in your hands (hence the clay), smells nice (somewhat perfume-y) and most importantly, feels like something I’d get at a spa. When I first put it on, I was surprised by the warming sensation, since I didn’t realize it had that effect. I liked it! I’ve had masks like that before and they just add another dimension to the experience. I left it on for 10 minutes and washed it right off. Some clay masks I’ve used are hard to wash off - not this one. Face felt smooth and had no irritation afterward. I really like this brand.
Warming sensation is so good
Butt Naked Baby Organic Sunshine Lotion | Everyday Moisturizer | Lightweight, Non-Greasy | Normal-to-Dry Skin | Aloe, Shea Butter, Sunflower Oil, Calendula, White Tea, Green Tea, Rooibos Tea, Lemon Oil | 6.7 oz
Butt Naked Baby
{'Brand': 'Butt Naked Baby', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin_e', 'Unit Count': '6.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.24 x 2.09 inches; 7.8 Ounces'}
I really wanted to like this. The name, packaging and labeling is cute. “The 91%” organic label on the front was odd, yet reassuring that they are a transparent and honest brand (I mean, where else have you seen such a random percentage?) Yet, when I smelled it, I did not like it. At all. I can’t describe it really; it’s a faint, cheap perfumey sunflower smell. I didn’t like it for our toddler and couldn’t even tolerate it for me. I wouldn’t say I’m really that picky of a person, but I just didn’t jive with the smell. I even offered it to my husband because he likes organic lotions for the back of his arms where he has some KP but even he didn’t like it! I guess in a pinch we could use it, but it will not be preferred over other scents.
The packaging is cute, the smell is not
NEW Challenger Men's Rinse Free Hand Wash - 1oz - Portable, 30% Alcohol Hand Wash both Cleans & Moisturizes. Hydrates Hands, Forearms, & Skin - Cleansing 30% Alc. Based Formula Washes and Nourishes
Challenger
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Challenger', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '851264008338'}
Clean fresh scent and well moisturized after using. Not greasy at all, very happy with quality of this product. Sleek packaging and convenient size for car, home, or even keeping in your pockets. I highly recommend.
Good option for hand sanitizer
Soo'AE Sweet Pink Bubble Mask, Clarifying & Softening, 1 Count
SOOAE
{'Brand': 'SOOAE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Softer', 'Scent': 'Peach', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 0.1 x 5.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'}
I’m pretty spoiled when it comes to facial products. I would say this is fine, not great, not terrible. It is a nicely packaged one time mask for a little at home spa day, but not something I’d go out and purchase over and over. It would make a really nice stocking stuffer or small gift for someone.
It’s nice! But not incredible
Rose Quartz Roller with Derma Roller 0.25mm, Facial Kit with Microneedle and Pink Jade Rollers
LOLYSENTA
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.1 x 1.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LS17', 'UPC': '850002524062', 'Manufacturer': 'LOLYSENTA, LLC'}
What I liked? Really beautiful roller and I thought the derma roller was really cool...until I read the instructions. “Roll back and forth 4-5 times...only apply light pressure and do not PUNCTURE the skin....sterilize the roller before and after each use for 30 MINUTES in disinfecting alcohol”. Y’all, I’m a busy mom with a toddler, I do not have the time to disinfect something for almost an hour each time I use it, and by use it, I mean roll it 4-5 times total. So while the jade roller is really beautiful and easy to use in of itself, this derma roller kinda seems...extra. I personally would prefer this to just be the roller; I’m too worried about actually using the roller incorrectly and hurting my skin, so I’ll just leave that type of work to the professionals. If you are looking for a jade roller only, there are lots of other options. If you want the full derma experience, then this option would be great for you.
Really nice combo, but with one caveat
Kidskin- Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil- Helps Combat Body and Foot Odor and Stubborn Body Acne and Skin Issues - Cruelty Free, Gluten Free, Paraben Free, Sulfate Free, Unscented, and Vegan- Made in USA
Kidskin
['Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is designed exclusively for teens, tweens, pre teens, and boys and girls to work as an effective, yet gentle body wash. Natural ingredients like Allantoin and Bisabolol nourish beyond surface level, and penetrate into the lower levels of the skin for the deepest hydration possible, while active ingredient tea tree oil works to fight body acne and skin issues teens are commonly prone to. Unlike shower bars and other soaps, our products are designed to soothe problematic and compromised skin. With 100% Natural ingredients that are paraben, sulfate, fragrance, and gluten free, the Kidskin Foaming Body Wash with Tea Tree Oil is gentle enough for every day use. Our mission is to provide teens (like our own!) with a body wash that leaves them feeling fresh and confident so they can focus on what really matters- every day. Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Extract, Polysorbate-20, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, ^ Glycerin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Sea Salt (Sodium Chloride), Tetrasodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Allantoin, Bisabolol']
{'Item Form': 'Bar, Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Kidskin', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 2.83 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '4012', 'UPC': '880628401263', 'Manufacturer': 'Kidskin'}
Nice foamy consistency, does NOT irritate my daughter's sensitive skin. Has a nice, strong tea tree smell but it's not so overpowering that it's annoying. I can see how it would successfully cut through odor and the tea tree in it is great for skin.
Strong tea tree smell but works!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Concern:** Prefers gentle, effective products suitable for dry and sensitive skin; emphasizes non-irritating formulations that provide hydration without triggering breakouts.

- **Product Functionality:** Values effective cleansing and versatile formulations that detoxify and enhance skin texture. Integrates products that offer both cleansing and hydration into daily routines while seeking solutions for specific issues like body acne.

- **Scent Preference:** Enjoys light, pleasant scents, and is evolving toward mild, natural fragrances, such as eucalyptus and grapefruit, based on recent positive experiences. Maintains a preference for fresh, clean aromas while avoiding strong, overpowering perfumes.

- **Texture Preference:** Favors lightweight textures for daily use but appreciates thicker, cream-like formulations for pampering. Open to various forms, including bar soaps, that enhance sensory enjoyment without leaving a greasy residue.

- **Usage Context:** Values convenient, easy-to-use options for self-care, with a discerning approach to single-use products. Willing to explore effective products that simplify skincare routines while boosting efficacy.

- **Purchase Consideration:** Evaluates products based on quality, performance, and sensory experience, showcasing a preference for functional items that address specific concerns while aligning with a simplicity-focused skincare routine.

Overall, the user prioritizes gentleness, functional benefits, and sensory enjoyment, demonstrating an evolving openness to mild, natural fragrances and effective skincare solutions. Their recent experience confirms a penchant for high-quality, artisanal products.
